title: Pet Details Response
description: Mock API response structure for GET /api/v1/announcements/:id (not yet implemented). Used by PetRepositoryImpl for mocked data until backend endpoint is available.

status.description: Status of the pet report (ACTIVE will be displayed as MISSING in UI)

lastSeenDate.description: ISO 8601 timestamp of when the pet was last seen

gender.description: Sex of the pet (displayed as ♂/♀ symbols in UI)

phone.description: Owner's phone number (at least one of phone/email required). Displayed as tappable link opening dialer.

email.description: Owner's email address (at least one of phone/email required). Displayed as tappable link opening mail composer.

microchipNumber.description: Microchip number (MOCKED - not available in current API, will be added later)

approximateAge.description: Approximate age of the pet (MOCKED - not available in current API, will be added later)

reward.description: Reward amount text (MOCKED - not available in current API, will be added later). Displayed as-is without formatting.

location.description: City where the pet was last seen (optional)

description.description: Additional description about the pet (optional, multi-line text allowed)
description.example: Friendly golden retriever, responds to 'Max'. Last seen near Lazienki Park wearing a red collar.
